LocaleTemplateCommentary: - 0=LR_TB: Left to right and top to bottom. Latin, Cyrillic, Greek, Armenian, Georgian, and so on
- 1=RL_TB: Right to left and top to bottom. Arabic, Hebrew, Syriac, and so on
- 2=TB_LR: Top to bottom and left to right. Mongolian, Mayan, and so on
- 3=TB_RL: Top to bottom and right to left. Chinese, Korean, Japanese, Jurchen, Khitan, and so on
